description: This test validates the damage law for matrix cracking (d2+) by using the constitutive model 152. The model consist of a cube 1x1x1mm with fibres perpendicular to the loading direction (90 degrees ply respect to the reference). The cube is divided in two regions or materials: center (with damage) and each side (elastic). Alya Implicit integration scheme is used.
name: sm152_cube_d2T
